languages.text: "Я приговариваю Леди Моллес-Секандас к освоению окраинных миров протектората. Дайте ей все необходимое для ведения дел — я ожидаю от нее впечатляющих результатов. Поскольку она признана виновной, Лорда Моллеса считать живым".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VC_MollesWin
дать нормально ПФ
Никого не казним
Весы налево

дать нормально ПФ
Никого не казним
Весы налево

languages.text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."
languages.original_text: "Я приговариваю Леди Моллес-Секандас к освоению окраинных миров протектората. Дайте ей все необходимое для ведения дел — я ожидаю от нее впечатляющих результатов. Поскольку она признана виновной, Лорда Моллеса считать живым".

traits.locale_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

languages.text: "Hierbei verurteile ich Lady Molles-Secundas zur Erkundung und Entwicklung der Randwelten des Protektorats. Gebt ihr alles, was sie für ihre neue Aufgabe braucht. Ich bin sicher, sie wird bemerkenswerte Ergebnisse liefern. Da sie für schuldig befunden wurde, ist Lord Molles hiermit als lebendig zu betrachten."
languages.original_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

traits.locale_text: "Hierbei verurteile ich Lady Molles-Secundas zur Erkundung und Entwicklung der Randwelten des Protektorats. Gebt ihr alles, was sie für ihre neue Aufgabe braucht. Ich bin sicher, sie wird bemerkenswerte Ergebnisse liefern. Da sie für schuldig befunden wurde, ist Lord Molles hiermit als lebendig zu betrachten."

languages.text: « Je condamne dame Molles-Secundas à une peine d'exploration et de développement des mondes reculés du protectorat. Qu'on lui donne tout le nécessaire pour mener à bien sa mission. J'escompte des résultats à la hauteur de mes attentes. Et puisque sa culpabilité est avérée, nous pouvons partir du principe que le seigneur Molles a survécu. »
languages.original_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

traits.locale_text: « Je condamne dame Molles-Secundas à une peine d'exploration et de développement des mondes reculés du protectorat. Qu'on lui donne tout le nécessaire pour mener à bien sa mission. J'escompte des résultats à la hauteur de mes attentes. Et puisque sa culpabilité est avérée, nous pouvons partir du principe que le seigneur Molles a survécu. »

languages.text: “我在此宣判莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人有罪，她将负责探索、开拓王朝的边缘世界。她可以得到开展工作所需的一切资源。我希望她能取得骄人的成绩，以此将功赎罪。此外，既然她的罪行已经查明，那莫莱斯勋爵将恢复原本的身份。”
languages.original_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

traits.locale_text: “我在此宣判莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人有罪，她将负责探索、开拓王朝的边缘世界。她可以得到开展工作所需的一切资源。我希望她能取得骄人的成绩，以此将功赎罪。此外，既然她的罪行已经查明，那莫莱斯勋爵将恢复原本的身份。”

languages.text: «Por la presente, sentencio a lady Molles-Secundas a la exploración y desarrollo de los mundos periféricos del protectorado. Proporciónenle todo lo que necesite para realizar su trabajo. Espero resultados excelentes. Con esta sentencia de culpabilidad, lord Molles se ha de considerar vivo».
languages.original_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

traits.locale_text: «Por la presente, sentencio a lady Molles-Secundas a la exploración y desarrollo de los mundos periféricos del protectorado. Proporciónenle todo lo que necesite para realizar su trabajo. Espero resultados excelentes. Con esta sentencia de culpabilidad, lord Molles se ha de considerar vivo».

languages.text: 「ここに、レディ・モレス・セクンダスを保護領の辺境惑星の探査および開発の任務に処する。彼女の業務遂行に必要な全ての物資を与えよ。素晴らしい成果を期待する。なお、彼女が有罪と認められたため、モレス公は生存中と見なすものとする」
languages.original_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

traits.locale_text: 「ここに、レディ・モレス・セクンダスを保護領の辺境惑星の探査および開発の任務に処する。彼女の業務遂行に必要な全ての物資を与えよ。素晴らしい成果を期待する。なお、彼女が有罪と認められたため、モレス公は生存中と見なすものとする」

languages.text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas, protektoranın uç dünyalarını keşfedip kalkındırmaya mahkûm edilmiştir. İşi için neye ihtiyacı varsa karşılansın. Kendisi suçlu bulunduğundan Lord Molles de hayatta addedilecektir."
languages.original_text: "I hereby sentence Lady Molles-Secundas to a duty of exploration and development of the protectorate's fringe worlds. Give her everything she needs to conduct her business. I expect her results to be impressive. As she has been found guilty, Lord Molles is to be deemed alive."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas, protektoranın uç dünyalarını keşfedip kalkındırmaya mahkûm edilmiştir. İşi için neye ihtiyacı varsa karşılansın. Kendisi suçlu bulunduğundan, Lord Molles da hayatta addedilecektir."
